title: Strengthening Organizational Development Competencies: Mobile-Based Biochemical Engineering Problem-Solving Skills Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Biochemistry and Engineering Concepts
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Biochemical problems occurring in actual industrial settings can be independently analyzed and solved with over 80% proficiency using PBL methods
Integrated thinking connecting biochemical theories to engineering applications is demonstrated through three or more case studies
Collaborative problem-solving activities with peers are performed three or more times weekly via mobile platforms

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
